title: Motley Fool Money: 11.12.2010
description: Asian market tumble.  Gold hits a new high.  Cisco and Disney report earnings.  And Walmart makes a big move for the holidays.  On this week's show, we'll discuss those stories, share some stocks on our radar, and talk with television critic Tim Goodman.
content:encoded: Asian market tumble.  Gold hits a new high.  Cisco and Disney report earnings.  And Walmart makes a big move for the holidays.  On this week's show, we'll discuss those stories, share some stocks on our radar, and talk with television critic Tim Goodman.
